duration_in_months: If no expected contract start and end dates are provided, please indicate that the contract will run for indefinite period. Else indicate duration of contract.
full_summary:
---

### Tender for Printing Services
**Reference Number**: MX-43079501482
**Publication Date**: 2024-04-01
**Tender Closing Date**: 2024-05-13 14:00:00

### Tender Overview
VIA Rail Canada Inc. is seeking a reliable supplier capable of providing a range of printing services, including storing merchandise, managing inventory, and processing orders from internal and external clients. The successful supplier will also be responsible for packaging and shipping products to Canada and internationally.

**Selection Criteria**
To be eligible, the tenderer must meet the following mandatory criteria:

* Experience: The tenderer must have at least five (5) years of experience in managing a similar program to the one specified in Appendix A.
* IT infrastructure: The tenderer's computer system must be capable of managing inventories related to a printing program.
* Bilingual services: The tenderer must provide a bilingual customer service team available from Monday to Friday, 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. EST.
* Warehouse location: The tenderer's primary warehouse must be located in Canada.

### Tender Information

* **Notice URL**: [https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2857953402/abstract?language=EN](https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2857953402/abstract?language=EN)
* **Contact Information**: Shiyao Fei, [Shiyao_Fei@viarail.ca](mailto:Shiyao_Fei@viarail.ca), (514) 871-6631.

### Trade Agreements
The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Tender Status
Tender Status: Expired

### Notice Price
Bidding and documents are available on http://www.merx.com. Fees may apply; see https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information.
